name: Play Catch
description:
Play Catch was made for The No Extra Licenses January Game Jam hosted by No Extra Lives. I am very grateful to have been invited to this Jam by my friend Jonathan Pangle. This is the first game that I have developed entirely on my own using Game Maker Studio. I am excited to continue developing this game so that it will be more fun and have customization options! Play Catch will soon be put on the Google Play store with the other games that were made during the jam.

All feedback will be very helpful for the further development of Play Catch!

I collaborated with Brandon Harrold who made the music and sound effects for me.
